name: Spy Loop
description:
This game was a entry for the "one minute game jam 2021".
The theme was: one minute.

Spy loop is a game where agent 422 has to disarm 4 bombs that are set to go off in 1 minute, even he isn't that fast.
lucky voor him he just got a new gadget.
a "Quantum Queue Sequencer".

He can use this gadget to get temporary in a time loop of 1 minute so he can use multiple versions of himself to disarm all 4 bombs in just 1 minute!
